body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Vincenzo's Benzos. My name is Billy Walker. How may I assist you today? May I start by asking your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Billy, my name is Jessica Patterson. I'm looking for more information about your cars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jessica! We have a wide variety of cars. To ensure I provide you with the best information, could you please tell me which type of car you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in sedans. I've heard good things about the executive models.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice, Jessica! We have new models with fantastic features in that category. If you could provide me with your email address, I can send you detailed specifications and pricing information.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is jessicapatterson at email dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jessica. One more thing, could you please share your contact number just in case we need to follow up with you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my number is two one two, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jessica. I'll make sure to send you all the information you need about our executive sedans shortly. Is there anything else I can do for you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Billy!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Jessica! Thank you for your time. If you have further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Billy Walker and the customer's name is Jessica Patterson.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
